Description:
In the middle of a vast arena stands an altar, covered in blood and surrounded by treasures. You all sense a powerful magic emanating from the altar, accompanied by an uneasy feeling in your guts. 

As you draw closer, a surge of magic courses through you, making your blood feel as though it's boiling inside your bodies, momentarily stunning you. When you recover, there it is: the Great Bird, in all its glory. It stares at you, its gaze piercing your souls, judging you. 

There is nowhere to run or hide. Your only option is to move toward the Great Bird, perched on its altar, waiting for you.
DescriptionAction: Now, it is time to face the judgment of the Great Bird.
